title: Tasty Lemon Pepper Chicken Recipe
content:
Delicious lemon pepper chicken tastes amazing with either fried rice or noodles. This tastes so yummy and is very easy to make.

This is a delicious and easy side made using chicken. This Chinese style chicken dish tastes fantastic with any Chinese dish or even plain rice. You can make this dry and serve it as an appetizer.

 

Lemon Pepper Chicken Recipe

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 25 mins

Total time: 35 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

 

FOR CHICKEN:

Boneless Chicken - 500 grams

Salt to taste

Black Pepper to taste

Egg - 1

All-Purpose Flour / Maida - ¼ cup

Cornflour - ¼ cup

Oil for shallow frying

Get Ingredients Powered by Chicory

 

FOR SAUCE:

Lemon Juice - 3 tablespoons

Soy Sauce - 3 tablespoons

Garlic - 2 teaspoons grated

Salt to taste

Sugar - 1 tablespoon

Black Pepper - 1 teaspoon

Cornflour - 1 teaspoon

Water - ½ cup

 

Instructions

Mix chicken in a bowl. Add other ingredients and mix well.

Heat oil in a pan. Add chicken and fry till golden. Drain and set aside.

Mix all sauce ingredients.

Add in sauce ingredients and mix well. Simmer for 3 to 5 mins.

Serve it.

recommendations.title: Tasty Ghee Chicken Curry Recipe
recommendations.content:
The spicy and flavourful chicken curry which is made using some spicy toasted spice powders. The ghee adds a nice flavor to the chicken curry. So good.
 
Ghee Chicken Curry Recipe
Prep time: 10 mins
Cook time: 45 mins

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
